name: Spring to Winter
description:
Uh oh, it looks like Spring is coming a bit too early this year! This means bad news for all the snowball creatures who've migrated south for the Winter. You must guide a lone snowball beyond the Baria mountains, to a place called "The Colder North" - a place of eternal Winter.

Quickly before the warm Spring sun melts you to a puddle, spring your way forward to sweet, cold, safety!
